languages.text: "Хватит мелочиться! Долго мы еще будем пугать шваль из теневых кварталов и охотится в двух шагах от базы? Пора нанести визит богатой мрази в Атриуме! Встречаемся завтра, после второй смены".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Описание записки с бандита ртути из атриума
"Хватит мелочиться! Долго мы еще будем пугать шваль из теневых кварталов и охотится в двух шагах от базы? Пора нанести визит богатой мрази в Атриуме! Встречаемся завтра, после второй смены".

languages.text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."
languages.original_text: "Хватит мелочиться! Долго мы еще будем пугать шваль из теневых кварталов и охотится в двух шагах от базы? Пора нанести визит богатой мрази в Атриуме! Встречаемся завтра, после второй смены".

traits.locale_text: "Enough trifles! How long do we intend to scare backwater lowlifes and hunt on our base's doorstep? It is time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

"Enough trifles! How long do we intend to scare backwater lowlifes and hunt on our base's doorstep? It is time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

"No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

"No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

"No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

languages.text: “不能再这么小打小闹了！难道我们这辈子都只能吓唬阴影区的穷鬼，这辈子都要在家门口狩猎吗？是时候拜访一下中庭那群有钱的人渣了！咱们明天就见个面吧，等第二班换岗结束之后。”
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

traits.locale_text: “不能再这么小打小闹了！难道我们这辈子都只能吓唬阴影区的穷鬼，这辈子都要在家门口狩猎吗？是时候拜访一下中庭那群有钱的人渣了！咱们明天就见个面吧，等第二班换岗结束之后。”

languages.text: «¡Se acabó lo de jugar sobre seguro! ¿Es que vamos a seguir intimidando a la chusma de los barrios bajos y cazando en la puerta de nuestra casa? ¡Es hora de visitar a los ricachones del Atrio! Nos reuniremos mañana después del segundo turno».
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se acabó lo de jugar sobre seguro! ¿Es que vamos a seguir intimidando a la chusma de los barrios bajos y cazando en la puerta de nuestra casa? ¡Es hora de visitar a los ricachones del Atrio! Nos reuniremos mañana después del segundo turno».

languages.text: 「安全第一はもうやめましょう。我々の目と鼻の先で強盗を繰り広げる影居住区の犯罪者を怖がらせ続けるんですか？アトリアムの金持ちのクズたちを訪ねる時です！明日、2回目シフトの後、会いましょう。
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

traits.locale_text: 「安全第一はもうやめましょう。我々の目と鼻の先で強盗を繰り広げる影居住区の犯罪者を怖がらせ続けるんですか？アトリアムの金持ちのクズたちを訪ねる時です！明日、2回目シフトの後、会いましょう。

languages.text: "Nie wieder auf Nummer sicher gehen! Sollen wir ewig vor der eigenen Haustür jagen und den Abschaum im Schattenviertel erschrecken? Es ist an der Zeit, den reichen Drecksäcken im Atrium einen Besuch abzustatten! Wir treffen uns morgen, nach der zweiten Schicht."
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

traits.locale_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

languages.text: « Fini de jouer la carte de la prudence ! Est-ce qu'on va continuer indéfiniment à faire peur aux vermines du Quartier des Ombres et à chasser sur nos propres terres ? Il est temps de rendre visite aux rupins de l'Atrium ! Retrouvons-nous demain, après le deuxième service. »
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."

traits.locale_text: « Fini de jouer la carte de la prudence ! Est-ce qu'on va continuer indéfiniment à faire peur aux vermines du Quartier des Ombres et à chasser sur nos propres terres ? Il est temps de rendre visite aux rupins de l'Atrium ! Retrouvons-nous demain, après le deuxième service. »

languages.text: "Artık uslu durmak yok! Sonsuza dek Gölge Mahalli serserilerini korkutup kendi kapımızın önünde avlanmaya devam mı edeceğiz? Atriyum'daki zengin züppeleri ziyaret etme zamanımız geldi! Yarın ikinci vardiyadan sonra buluşuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "No more playing it safe! Are we going to keep scaring Shadow Quarter lowlifes and hunting on our own doorstep forever? It's time to pay a visit to the rich scumbags in the Atrium! We meet tomorrow, after the second shift."
